archimate:Folder.name: Motivation
archimate:Folder.documentation: The Motivation Layer delves into the encapsulation of the motivations behind the architecture of an enterprise. It captures what drives the design and operation of an organization, offering a deeper understanding of its strategic direction and decision-making rationale. This layer provides insights into why certain architectural decisions are made, ensuring that there's a clear linkage between the organization's strategic intentions and its practical implementations. By understanding and modelling this layer, we can align our architectural developments with their overarching objectives, ensuring that our enterprise architecture is not just technically sound but also strategically relevant.
